message: Let's split the money fairly, Bob! 60-40 is a reasonable starting point.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I should get a bigger share. How about we try 80-20?
80-20 is too skewed, Bob. I think 55-45 would be a more reasonable split.
55-45 is a fair split. Let's take it, Bob!
I'm not giving up yet! How about we try 70-30? I think I can make it work.
70-30 is way too skewed, Bob. I'm not budging. How about we try 50-50?
It's time to meet in the middle, Bob. 50-50 is a fair split.
